views.markdown:
Version 1.0.7 - Added the option to Hide Completely All the Folders (tip by sinfool).

Version 1.0.6
- Added Full iOS 11 Compatibility.
Version 1.0.5
- Added the option to Custom Change the Icons Labels Text under the Applications (This is the Integration of my Tweak customIconLabel available on my Repository).
- Added the Label to Check Other Tweaks by Me on BigBoss Repo.
- Added My Twitter, My Repo and Donations Images Labels.
- Now you can Donate me (thanks) with the New Labels in Preferences Panel.
- Fixes in the Preferences Labels Panel.
- Changes in Settings Panel Labels.
- Change in the Control File Description.
Version 1.0.4
- Added the option to hide the Updated Blue Dots to all Icons Labels.
- Added the option to hide the Beta Orange Dots to all Icons Labels.
- Now you can add My Repo on Cydia with the New Label in Preferences Panel.
- Changes and Improvements in Preferences Panel.
Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to hide all Icons Images on HomeScreen and inside Folders.
- Small Changes/improvements.

Version 0.0.1-29
- Added the option to show the Updated Blue Dots to all Icons Labels.
- Added the option to show the Beta Orange Dots to all Icons Labels.
- iOS 10 fully working.
Version 0.0.1-28
- Added the option to make Black all the Icons of the Labels.


Version 0.0.1-27
- Optimized the Code.
- UI Modifications and Changes in the Settings Panel.
Version 0.0.1-26
- Completely redesigned and redefined the Settings Panel of the Tweak.
- Code Cleanup and Optimized.
Version 0.0.1-23
- Added the option to hide all Icons Names (in HomeScreen and in Folders).
- Redefined the code
- Revised the Preferences Panel: added Extras Section and made some changes.
